author: random-wizard
long_description:
# gear_up

https://codeberg.org/random-wizard/gear_up/raw/branch/main/screenshot.png

Mod for luanti to allow character to equip items; jewelry, armor, outfits, etc... Also has a basic crate system to allow loot boxes to appear in different block types and depths; ice crates, sand crates, deep stone crates, etc...

Code is a fork of mod equippable accessories.
https://content.minetest.net/packages/davidthecreator/equippable_accessories/

Even though this mod is self contained, I would not recommend running this mod in conjuction with equippable_accessories or 3d_armor. It will produce a lot of duplicate items that do similar things but are slightly different. It will also produce duplicate inventory tabs that do similar things but are slightly different.
name: gear_up
short_description: A mod that adds wearable gear and allows re-color of items.
